name: Droppy Food
description:
A one button hyper-casual game created by Ollie Wright (2070883) and Khyan Jordan (2063707), AKA Team Sealy Bag, for TDEMO.

It was created without any tutorials in Scratch. The game features a score system, sound/music and a restart system if you fail.

Instructions:
Drop food into the shopping cart then on top of the food that's already stacked! 

Controls:
Space - It's a one button game... do you really need me to spell it out for you?

Credits:
Ollie Wright - Art, Coding
Khyan Jordan - Coding
https://freesound.org/ - Sound

Link to scratch page:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/586373225
